content:
In which Questing Beast talks about DCC:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=s9w8YVqYs5I

And yeah, the DCC style is flabby and horrible. I have a collection of the first 50, plus a few of the later ones. And they're unplayable as written. I have to steal their maps and write a one-line/paragraph key if I want stuff from one. Put some of the Goodman text in a handout as lore.

It reads exactly like a late AD&D 2nd Ed railroad module, with big D&D 3.0 stat blocks.

#ttrpg #dcc
